scripts.start-all: npm run clone-frontend && npm install --prefix OnlinePrivacyPilot_Frontend && concurrently "BROWSER=None npm start --prefix OnlinePrivacyPilot_Frontend" "electron-forge start"
scripts.make-all: npm run build-backend && npm run build-frontend && electron-forge make
scripts.build-frontend: npm run clone-frontend && npm install --prefix ../OnlinePrivacyPilot_Frontend && npm run build --prefix ../OnlinePrivacyPilot_Frontend
scripts.build-backend: npm run clone-backend && cd ../OnlinePrivacyPilot_Backend && virtualenv .venv && . ./.venv/bin/activate && pip install -e . && pyinstaller --onefile opp/rest_api.py && deactivate && cd ../OnlinePrivacyPilot
